select * from tb_group where group_status = 1 order by group_id desc
mapper.update: update tb_group set modify_time=now(),latest_block = #{latestBlock} where group_id = #{groupId}
mapper.select: select a.group_id,b.maxDay,c.block_number,c.trans_count from tb_group a LEFT JOIN (select group_id,max(trans_day) as maxDay from tb_trans_daily GROUP BY group_id)b on (a.group_id = b.group_id) LEFT JOIN tb_trans_daily c on(b.group_id = c.group_id and b.maxDay = c.trans_day);

SELECT a.group_id groupId,a.latest_block latestBlock,a.trans_count transactionCount,b.contractCount,c.orgCount,d.nodeCount FROM tb_group a LEFT JOIN ( select group_id,count(1) contractCount from tb_contract where contract_status=2 and contract_type=0 GROUP BY group_id )b on(a.group_id = b.group_id) LEFT JOIN ( select group_id,count(1) orgCount from tb_group_org_map where map_status=1 GROUP BY group_id )c on(a.group_id = c.group_id) LEFT JOIN ( select group_id,count(1) nodeCount from tb_node GROUP BY group_id )d on(a.group_id = d.group_id) where a.group_status = 1 and a.group_id = #{groupId}
